post:
We are SetraHost, a reliable hosting platform that provides hosting services that you can not only rely on, but also afford.
The quality we put out is outstanding, at only $1.66 per month and continuing to hold a 100% uptime (which can be seen on our public server uptime page).

We know you will love our services at SetraHost, but if at any chance you don’t, we do provide a 30 day money back guarantee.
Your happiness is our first priority.

OUR SHARED SSD HOSTING PLANS:
We have the best hosting plan for you!

We know you're probably hesitate to try a company you have never heard of so for a limited time,
we are currently offering 50% OFF off our Starter and Evolve plan for the lifetime of your account, making it only $10 per year of service! (No coupon needed.) We want to show you what we're all about! We also have plans that are billed monthly!

About SetraHost and our mission:
We began working in the hosting industry in 2005 as a hobby, but it became so much more.
We continue to have genuine love for what we do and constantly strive to deliver quality services for a price that you can afford.

Our goal is to make it so you can completely focus on your website and not constantly worry about your host being down or always having issues. Don't worry though because if you do need assistance, we put extensive focus on Customer Support and are always here to help. Even in the middle of the night.

We are a small company who doesn't see our customers as just a number, this is a little family and we're excited to have you a part of it!

Any questions?
Feel free to head over to our website at SetraHost.com and talk to a sales rep today. We are here for you every step of the way!

Thank you for taking your time to check us out and we look forward to welcoming you to the Setra family.
